item.title: software
item.description: Name Francesco Antonello Ferraro Graduation Software Engineer Email francescoaferraro@gmail.com Birthdate 12/30/1987 Location Porto Alegre/RS - Brazil Professional Summary Fluent English speaker and Linux user for +15 years with intrinsic conteinerized devOps knowledge. Although academically graduated as a Civil Engineer; I have been coding full stack professionally for the past 5 years. Working server-side with Golang, C# & Java whilst doing mainly React on the front end.
